abstract: While the ongoing back-and-forth between Yahoo and Microsoft is the talk of Herb Allen’s annual mogul retreat in Sun Valley, Yahoo chief Jerry Yang is reportedly less than sanguine on a sitdown with his suitors.
lead_paragraph: While the ongoing back-and-forth between Yahoo and Microsoft is the talk of Herb Allen’s annual mogul retreat in Sun Valley, Yahoo chief Jerry Yang is reportedly less than sanguine on a sitdown with his suitors.

headline.main: Sun Valley Diary: A Meeting With Microsoft? Yang Says No
